product.name: Diorskin Nude Air Glow Powder
product.description: A precursor in the art of natural, for beauty that grows more radiant with each day, Dior broadens its nude makeup expertise with the innovation of Diorskin Nude Air Glow Powder: a luminous powder as weightless and beneficial as a breath of fresh air that revives and illuminates the complexion's original colour and lets the skin breathe for a continuously healthy glow.
